title: Part One: The U.S. Border Patrol Is A Nightmare That Never Ends
itunes:title: Part One: The U.S. Border Patrol Is A Nightmare That Never Ends
description:
Robert is joined by Caitlin Durante to discuss the U.S. Border Patrol.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. https://timeline.com/harlon-carter-nra-murder-2f8227f2434f 
  2. https://theintercept.com/2019/01/12/border-patrol-history/ 
  3. https://www.texasobserver.org/texas-civil-rights-project-harrington-retire/ 
  4. https://www.amazon.com/Migra-History-Border-American-Crossroads/dp/0520266412
  5. https://www.salon.com/2012/07/20/cruelty_on_the_border/ 
  6. https://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2014/10/border-patrol-the-green-monster-112220
  7. https://www.propublica.org/article/a-group-of-agents-rose-through-the-ranks-to-lead-the-border-patrol-theyre-leaving-it-in-crisis 
  8. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/09/15/us/border-patrol-culture.html
  9. https://books.google.com/books?id=mFQor2oScm0C&pg=PA29&dq=kicking+a+Mexican+male+who+was+handcuffed+and+lying+facedown+on+the+ground&hl=en&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwinlJqK0r3fAhUSnFkKHdzJDD4Q6AEIKDAA#v=onepage&q=kicking%20a%20Mexican%20male%20who%20was%20handcuffed%20and%20lying%20facedown%20on%20the%20ground&f=false
